sentences.en: a traditional method of brewing beer
All of the poems are written in traditional metres and rhyme schemes.
sentences.cn: 所有的诗都按传统的韵律和韵脚而作。

sentences.en: Consultation is traditional in the consensual Belgian system of labour relations.
sentences.cn: 协商是建立在意见一致基础上的比利时劳资关系体系的传统做法。

sentences.en: Earl Grey, Darjeeling and Jasmine are best-selling traditional teas.
sentences.cn: 伯爵茶、大吉岭茶和茉莉花茶是最畅销的几种传统茶叶。

sentences.en: He ignores the traditional Christian dualism between body and soul.
sentences.cn: 他无视传统基督教的肉体与灵魂的二元论。

sentences.en: Several manufacturers are also nibbling away at Ford's traditional customer base.
sentences.cn: 几家制造商也在蚕食福特公司的传统客户群。

sentences.en: The Health Secretary called for a return to traditional family values.
sentences.cn: 卫生部部长呼吁传统家庭价值观的回归。

sentences.en: The stained-glass panels are etched and then handpainted using traditional methods.
sentences.cn: 彩色玻璃板先经过蚀刻，然后用传统技法手工着色。

sentences.en: The veto has been a traditional instrument of diplomacy for centuries.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来否决权一直是外交上惯用的手段。

sentences.en: Their marriage is a delicate balance between traditional and contemporary values.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻在传统和现代价值观之间保持着微妙平衡。

sentences.en: Three of the new products are based on traditional herbal medicines.
sentences.cn: 有3种新产品是以传统的草药为基础研制的。

sentences.en: Traditional cheesemaking skills give our brie its soft, supple, creamy texture.
sentences.cn: 用传统干酪制作技术制成的布里干酪柔软，不易裂开，而且口感细滑。

sentences.en: Traditional hiding places are easy pickings for experienced burglars.
sentences.cn: 对有经验的入室窃贼来说，人们惯常藏钱的那些地方最容易得手。

sentences.en: Traditional slash and burn farming methods have exhausted the soil.
sentences.cn: 传统的刀耕火种农业方式耗尽了土地的肥力。

sentences.en: Traditional Spanish food is delicious and its specialities are worth searching out.
sentences.cn: 传统的西班牙食品美味可口，其特色菜肴值得寻访。

sentences.en: Using traditional methods poor farmers can be virtually self-sufficient.
sentences.cn: 采用传统的方法，贫穷的农民基本上能自给自足。

words.tran_cn: 传统派的；传统主义者的
传统主义者；因循守旧者

trans.tran_cn: 传统的，习俗的，惯例的，守旧的
trans.tran_en: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people
